SENT.plain: OBJECTIVE: Carotid dissection is a rare cause of headache in pregnancy
STUDY DESIGN: A 38-year-old woman gravida 5 para 3-0-1-3 presented at 21 weeks with a headache
CONCLUSION: Carotid artery dissection may cause refractory headache in pregnancy
Prompt anticoagulation is required due to the potential for stroke
